title: Kayn x Rhaast
body:
Idk, It sounds pretty funny to me. Why not have a valentines day skin around this idea?

The banter could be legendary

Kayn: Rhaast, Zed never notices me...will you?

Rhaast: _Probably not_

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

replies.body: Only after we get their Christmas skin, Candy Kayn.

I actually really want a Star Guardian Kayn, where Rhaast is his medium or whatever and turns into a cute critter. Also, as someone else mentioned, I can't believe they didn't do Candy Kayn last year. I also really like Odyssey Kayn, especially his and Rhaast's lines. 

A Valentine skin could be fun though. Although, I thought that about Rakan, and I am not a fan of the Valentine skin he got.
I LOVE THS IDEA. mind if i draw a concept for it?
Go for it, I'd love to see a concept for it. Don't forget to make Rhaast's scythe eye super cutesy ;)

> [{quoted}](name=AbiwonKenabi,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=cUEldJ0M,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-09-14T03:35:20.391+0000)
>
> I actually really want a Star Guardian Kayn, where Rhaast is his medium or whatever and turns into a cute critter. 

And since we already have a Dark Star Rhaast, I say the two final forms should be Dark Star Kayn...

And Star Guardian Rhaast.

Rhaast transformation: "Kayn gets stabbed"

RhaastL "It's not like i wanted to use your body or anything, b-baka!"

Sooooo lovebirds kayn?

With chocolate Assassin and cupid Rhaast?

One create forms of delicious and sweet chocolate to surprise those that want to give a present to their loved ones, while the other brings love wherever it goes and makes sure it reaches everyone's heart (by impaling it with a huge, pink scythe)

Eat your heart out {{champion:498}} and {{champion:497}}!
Petitition to make Rhaast waer a dress when he kills Kayn.
